✔ Top AltiCare Supplier

✔ Manufacturer's Warranty

settings.title: Does this raised toilet seat fit all toilet sizes?
settings.answer: The Elevated Comfort Raised Toilet Seat is designed to fit most standard toilets. However, always measure your toilet’s dimensions to ensure compatibility.

settings.title: How stable is the raised toilet seat?
settings.answer: The easy-to-install brackets and adjustable armrests make the toilet seat incredibly safe for regular use. However, you should regularly check to ensure the seat brackets are tightly secured.

settings.title: Is this raised toilet seat suitable for permanent installation?
settings.answer: The raised seat is intended for temporary use and ideal for post-surgery recovery or when extra assistance is needed. It can be easily installed or removed as required.

settings.title: Will this interfere with the existing toilet lid?
settings.answer: The original toilet seat lid must be removed before installing the AltiCare unit.

settings.title: What is the weight capacity of the AltiCare Raised Toilet Lift?
settings.answer: The lift is built to support up to 300 lbs, providing stability and safety for a wide range of users.

settings.title: Does it need professional installation, or can I set it up myself?
settings.answer: The product is designed for easy, tool-free assembly and installation. A detailed instruction guide is provided to help you set it up independently.

settings.title: Can the AltiCare Raised Toilet Lift be adjusted for different users?
settings.answer: While the seat height is fixed, the armrests are adjustable in width, allowing an inner width of either 16 or 18 inches to accommodate different user needs.

settings.title: What should I do if the lift becomes loose or unstable?
settings.answer: Regularly check that all screws and components are tightened securely. If any parts show signs of wear or damage, contact customer service for support or replacements.

settings.title: How do I clean and maintain the lift?
settings.answer: Wipe the lift down with a mild detergent or disinfectant using a soft cloth. Avoid abrasive cleaners to protect the material’s finish.

settings.title: Does the lift require regular servicing?
settings.answer: No regular servicing is required. However, it’s recommended to inspect the product periodically to ensure all components are secure and functioning correctly.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
